      • createFileAndPath

        public static void createFileAndPath(java.io.File file)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Create the given file if it doesn't exist, will also create directories if they do not exist.
        If the file already exist, nothing will happen.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
